about_the_game:
Born in the origins of the Universe, you are a particle with the power to play musical notes in the form of waves. Experience this fascinating music-driven adventure that transforms sound into puzzles using timing, dexterity, and agility.

Solve Music-Driven Puzzles

The Lullaby of Life is a puzzle adventure where you encounter multiple timing-based puzzles. Solve them using sound waves that you have to match in sequences of different colors and symbols. Challenge the way you think with each level featuring unique puzzles and mechanics.

Awaken new companions, bring life to inert beings, and solve your way in this abstract universe!

Become an Adventurer of the Universe

You are the catalyst of new life everywhere in this universe. Travel around and avoid obstacles, explore, find secrets, run from enemies and dangers, and behold this journey where each level has its own unique setting, characters, and aesthetics.

Bring Life to Dormant Beings

While venturing into this universe you will encounter different beings. The main objective and core of each level are Dormant Elders. Bring them to life through sequences of sound waves from you and multiple companions who follow you along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Play notes to solve timing-based puzzles in a journey where you bring inert beings to life. Explore colorful environments, awaken note companions, and create sound to find your way in this music-driven puzzle adventure.
supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
